member.name: D2D1_MORPHOLOGY_MODE
member.summary: The mode for the Morphology effect.

member.name: D2D1_MORPHOLOGY_MODE.D2D1_MORPHOLOGY_MODE_ERODE
member.summary: The maximum value from each RGB channel in the kernel is used.

member.name: D2D1_MORPHOLOGY_MODE.D2D1_MORPHOLOGY_MODE_DILATE
member.summary: The minimum value from each RGB channel in the kernel is used.
